QuestData.Title: Nura Pathfinder
QuestData.Description: Southern Barrens is under attack by the Alliance. The tauren have sent out a call for help that we simply cannot ignore. All able bodied soldiers of the Horde should assist.$B$BIf you wish to help, take the path to the High Road, located in the village. Seek out Nura Pathfinder.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Nura Pathfinder on the High Road in Southern Barrens.
